Description:
Unbeatable Location
Built in 1961, this beautifully kept home is now offered for sale for the first time.
Situated in a quiet street in Kennington and sitting in a very affordable price bracket, the property will be well received by investors and owner-occupiers alike.
Features include: 3 bedrooms (1 with huge BIR's) , large lounge with heating & cooling, recently updated kitchen, 2nd living area/rumpus room.
Outside we have well kept gardens, a shady and spacious backyard and a single garage with concrete floor and power.
Inspect now.
Jesse Gardner : 0428 310 893

Description:
A Refreshingly Real Renovation
It's not often an owner takes pride in a renovation to the extent that is on offer at this 2 bedroom unit.
From the new plumbing and wiring to the new floor and window covers throughout, the home is now as good as new.
The new kitchen is striking and the level of care that has gone into it's remodelling is evident the moment you step through the front door.
Demand from investors in Kennington is through the roof and this property is equally suited to owner-occupiers who want the convenience of having the CBD at their fingertips.
Wendy Scott

STUNNING GEORGIAN STYLE FAMILY RESIDENCE
Situated in the prime residential precinct of Kennington off Yalambee Drive, close to Strath shopping centres, Secondary schools & University is this superb home featuring formal lounge, separate formal dining, 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, lovley kitchen family room opening onto a spaciouse light filled north facing sunroom looking onto a private terraced garden at the rear. The property includes, large formal entry, delightful welll established gardens, ducted evap cooling, gas heating, laundry - Double carport, workshop and plenty of storage.

Situated on a 670m2 allotment on the peaceful end of Neale St, this property will appeal to investors and owner-occupiers alike.

Description:
Affordable Investment In Prized Location
If you are keen to enter the investment market, and many are, this affordable home could be just the one to get you started. It's in the university precinct, it is close to the Strath Hill and Strath Village shopping centres and it's only a few minutes into the CBD.Situated on a quiet, tree-lined street, this home has a neat, fuss-free front garden and a single carport.Inside the spaces are all bright and easy to care for. There's an open kitchen, meals and lounge area. The kitchen has a gas upright stove and plenty of storage. A gas heater sits against a cream-painted brick wall and an inverter, reverse-cycle split-system goes hand in hand to maintain comfortable conditions at all times.Two bedrooms are at the rear of the home and a bathroom with shower over the bath and toilet adjoins these.There is a shed in the back garden for tools and bits and pieces and the garden provides a lovely shaded area for summer sojourns. Presently tenanted at $160 per week with room to improve.
Insights: 17 other 2 bedroom house in KENNINGTON have recently been sold.

Description:
Great House in a Sought after Location
This elevated family California Bungalow is just full of character and charm, from the gorgeous facade to the wide entry with polished floor boards, loveley

Description:
Perfect Position
This terrific family home is located in a peaceful court location with no through traffic, set on a large block with established gardens. Spacious elegant formal lounge, open plan kitchen/meals and family room. The kitchen has been recently updated and includes D/W, elec oven and gas hotplates plus walk in pantry. There are four bedrooms, plus study, master has 3 pc ensuite plus WIR. The home is limited mobile friendly and includes ramp access, stepless shower in central bathroom, toilet to accommodate chair access and vinyl plank flooring to main living area whilst still being family friendly. Ducted evap cooling, floor heating plus split systems. Outdoor entertaining area includes built in BBQ, double carport plus double garage with remote and toilet.
Conveniently located close to shopping centre, schools, university, Kennington Reservoir and delightful walking track.
Jenny Donaldson : 0409 484 391

Description:
Prime Kennington Location
This is your wish list. Prime location close to Strath Village and Kennington Catholic and Public primary schools and only minutes to the university is this classic 1950's contemporary style brick veneer home. Accommodation comprises Entrance Hall, Master Bedroom with B.I.Robes & Ensuite, 2 other spacious Bedrooms with B.I.Robes, light filled Lounge, well appointed Kitchen and adjoining meals area, separate Family/Living room, 3 piece Bathroom & Laundry. This is the ideal first home with so much potential and a great renovator with hardwood and pine flooring throughout. Sited on a large allotment with double length garage with auto door, carport, established gardens, rainwater tanks and pumps.
This has been a fantastic family home for the current owners for over 50 years.
This property is a real gem. Inspect with confidence. NEW ON MARKET

Description:
Fantastic Kennington Location with ready made Tenant
Offering a nice size seperate backyard with plenty of room to relax in, this unit will appeal to those who either want to invest or vacant possession can be arranged if required. Features 2 bedrooms with BIR's, light bright kitchen-meals-living area & seperate laundry & bathroom. Single carport. Fantastic current tenant who would love to stay on. Current rent $160.00pw. Situated within walking distance to the University or to town. This unit is a great investment for your future.
